description: Documentation for 9.7.15.6.2. Matrix fragments for warpgroup-level multiply-accumulate operation with sparse matrix A

files.title: Overview
files.summary: In this section we describe how the contents of thread registers are associated with fragments of A matrix and the sparsity metadata.

files.title: 9.7.15.6.2.1. Matrix Fragments for sparse wgmma.mma_async.m64nNk32
files.summary: A warpgroup executing sparse `wgmma.mma_async.m64nNk32` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m64nNk32` where N is a valid n dimension as listed in [Matrix Shape](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#asynchronous-warpgroup-level-matrix-shape).

files.title: 9.7.15.6.2.2. Matrix Fragments for sparse wgmma.mma_async.m64nNk16
files.summary: A warpgroup executing sparse `wgmma.mma_async.m64nNk16` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m64nNk16` where N is a valid n dimension as listed in [Matrix Shape](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#asynchronous-warpgroup-level-matrix-shape).

files.title: 9.7.15.6.2.3. Matrix Fragments for sparse wgmma.mma_async.m64nNk64
files.summary: A warpgroup executing sparse `wgmma.mma_async.m64nNk64` will compute an MMA operation of shape `.m64nNk64` where N is a valid n dimension as listed in [Matrix Shape](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#asynchronous-warpgroup-level-matrix-shape).
